import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react'; import {v4 as uuidv4} from 'uuid'; export default function TableForm({description, setDescription, quantity, setQuantity, price, setPrice, amount, setAmount}) { const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const newItems = { id: uuidv4(), description: description, quantity: quantity, price: price, amount: amount } setDescription("") setQuantity("") setPrice("") setAmount("") StyleSheetList([...list]) } useEffect( () => { const calculateAmount = (amount) => { setAmount(quantity*price); } calculateAmount(amount) }, [amount, setAmount, price, quantity]) return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
setPrice(e.target.value)} />

{amount}

) }
